parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project to which the table or view belongs.

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The name of the schema to which the table or view belongs.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: The name of the table or view that you want to view.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of the table or view that you want to view. Valid values:

*   **internal**: internal table
*   **external**: external table
*   **view**: view
*   **materializedView**: [materialize view](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/maxcompute/user-guide/materialized-view-operations)
